remarks: Domain and codomain of the identity arrow.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 11-Jan-2017.)
statement:
idafval.i $e |- I = ( IdA ` C ) $.
idafval.b $e |- B = ( Base ` C ) $.
idafval.c $e |- ( ph -> C e. Cat ) $.
idahom.x $e |- ( ph -> X e. B ) $.
idahom.h $e |- H = ( HomA ` C ) $.
idahom $p |- ( ph -> ( I ` X ) e. ( X H X ) ) $.
